name: Reaching Heaven
description:
WASD movement and SPACE to jump.

Hello everyone. This is my entry for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam.

It is missing some essential features (like a win condition xD ) but it offers the minimum viable gameplay idea I want to bring into this game jam. Did not get the amount of free time I would like to have in order to improve my prototype though but no excuses. Hope you like this prototype and any feedback is really appreciate.
